data.title: Unsolved Murder Cases
data.text:
CURRENT DECADE 2023 Name: Adrian Roebuck

Age: 25

Location: 2131 E. Magnolia Ave.

Details: On 05/20/23, detectives responded to 2131 E. Magnolia Ave. where victim had a gunshot wound and was transported to UT. Investigation is ongoing. Name: Emory Johnson

Age: 25

Location: 2405 Center Ave.

Details: On 06/07/23, detective responded to the scene to find the victim suffering from a gunshot wound and was pronounced deceased. Investigation is ongoing. Name: Jarmarion Chambers

Age: 18

Location: 1133 Daylily Dr.

Details: On 06/22/23, detectives responded to a murder investigation and discovered victim deceased at the scene. Investigation is ongoing at this time. Name: Dorian Steeley

Age: 47

Location: 1308 Stair Ave.

Details: On 10/04/23, detectives responded to 1308 Stair Ave. for a report of a homicide. The victim was pronounced deceased at the hospital. Name: Christopher Charles Hill

Age: 51

Location: 218 East Depot Ave.

Details: On 12/13/23, detectives responded to a murder at 218 E. Depot Ave. Victim was discovered suffering from gunshot wound. Investigation is ongoing at this time. 2022 Name: Donald DeShazo

Age: 47

Location: 2418 Wilson Avenue

Details: On 01/21/22, officers responded to Wilson Avenue on a house fire where a body had been located in the bathtub. Investigation is ongoing. Name: Ricky Bernard Waters

Age: 18

Location: 4716 Joe Lewis

Details: On 3/5/22, investigator discovered victim in parking lot Q of Montgomery Village. Victim was suffering from a gunshot wound and was pronounced deceased. Investigation is ongoing. Name: Jeremy Paul

Age: 44

Location: 200 Block Humes Street

Details: On 3/7/22, investigators were notified of a homicide that occurred between Morgan Street and East Jackson Avenue in a homeless encampment. Victim’s body was found in an overgrown lot under James White Parkway area. Investigation continues. Name: William Edward Burris Jr.

Age: 53

Location: 128 N. Bertrand Street

Details: On 8/2/22, investigators responded to a stabbing call at Morningside Gardens Apartments and discovered victim deceased at the scene. Investigation is ongoing at this time. Name: Richard Tyron "U Train" Wynn

Age: 24

Location: 1932 Rosedale Avenue

Details: On 8/16/22, upon contact victim was suffering from at least one gunshot wound. The victim was transported to hospital and died as a result of his injuries. Name: Amilcar Martinez

Age: 17

Location: 1400 Block of Washington Avenue

Details: On 9/2/22, investigators responded to a homicide call near the intersection of Washington Ave. and Winona St. Victim was pronounced deceased at the scene. Investigation is ongoing. Name: Samuel Whitfield

Age: 38

Location: 2717 Wilson Avenue

Details: On 9/18/22, investigators responded to a homicide call at 2717 Wilson Ave. The victim was transported to the hospital where he was later pronounced deceased. Investigation is ongoing. Name: Branden Derrell Smiles

Age: 27

Location: 3572 Holston Hill Road

Details: On 10/10/22, investigators responded to a man lying face down in the road. The victim was unresponsive, had multiple gunshot wounds and was pronounced deceased at the scene. Investigation is ongoing. Name: Stephen Lundy

Age: 20

Location: 2509 Parkview Avenue

Details: On 10/13/22, officers responded to a shooting call on Parkview Ave. where three victims were suffering from gunshot wounds. Stephen was pronounced deceased at the hospital. Investigation is ongoing. Name: Martel Thomas

Age: 27

Location: 340 McConnell Street

Details: On 11/24/22, officers received calls of a shooting in the parking lot of 340 McConnell St. Upon arrival, officers located the victim deceased due to multiple gunshot wounds. Investigation continues. Name: Germany Hines

Age: 16

Location: 440 Taylor Homes Road

Details: On 12/20/22, officers responded to a murder at 440 Taylor Homes. Victim was found deceased from gunshot wound. Investigation is ongoing. 2021 Name: Harry Upshaw

Age: 44

Location: Wilder Place at Fuller Avenue

Details: On 01/06/21, investigator responded to a murder at Wilder Place at Fuller Avenue. Investigation is ongoing at this time. Name: Jonah Caldwell

Age: 25

Location: 2634 Magnolia Avenue

Details: On 01/18/21, investigator responded to a murder at 2634 Magnolia Avenue with multiple victims. Victim was found deceased of apparent gunshot wound. Name: Marquis Nolan

Age: 23

Location: 2634 Magnolia Avenue

Details: On 01/18/21, investigator responded to a murder at 2634 Magnolia Avenue. with multiple victims. Victim was found deceased of apparent gunshot wound. Name: Brian Hicks

Age: 32

Location: 1425 Daylily Drive

Details: On 02/14/21, officers responded in regards to a possible home invasion at 1425 Daylily Drive. Victim was discovered with apparent gunshot wound. Investigation is ongoing. Name: Janaria Muhammad

Age: 15

Location: 2561 Selma Avenue

Details: On 02/16/21, officers responded to homicide at 2561 Selma Avenue. Victim was discovered laying behind house suffering from at least one apparent gunshot wound. Investigation is ongoing. Name: Jamarion Gillette

Age: 15

Location: Cherokee Trail Way

Details: On 03/09/21, Victim was found suffering from gunshot wound on the side of Cherokee Trail Way. Investigation is ongoing. Name: Wayne Humphrey

Age: 41

Location: 2908 Brooks Avenue

Details: On 03/18/21, Victim was found deceased from gunshot wound at 2908 Brooks Avenue. Investigation is ongoing at this time. Name: Eric Bolden

Age: 46

Location: 405 Hembree Street

Details: On 05/03/21, Officers responded to a murder investigation at 405 Hembree Street where victim was located on the front porch suffering from a gunshot wound to upper chest. Investigation is ongoing at this time. Name: Muhammad Allen

Age: 41

Location: 2710 Louise Avenue

Details: On 05/17/21, officers responded to a shooting at 2710 Louise Avenue. Upon arrival, victim was found discovered to be deceased. Investigation is ongoing. Name: Carlos Sweeney

Age: 24

Location: 603 Longview Road

Details: On 06/23/21, officers responded to a murder investigation at 603 Longview Road. Victim was found inside apartment deceased from apparent gunshot wound. Investigation is ongoing at this time. Name: Donald Busby

Age: 48

Location: 4010 Catalpa Avenue

Details: On 07/01/21, officers responded to 4010 Catalpa Avenue to find the victim deceased. Investigation is ongoing. Name: Chaka Sligh

Age: 36

Location: 2725 E. Fifth Avenue

Details: On 07/17/21, officer responded to a murder at 2725 E. Fifth Avenue. Investigation is ongoing. Name: Matthew "Mack Jr" Scott

Age: 34

Location: 2530 Riverside Drive

Details: On 07/23/21, officers responded to 2530 Riverside Drive to find victim deceased near the roadway. Investigation is ongoing at this time. Name: Martaysha Flack

Age: 20

Location: 1916 Natchez Avenue

Details: On 07/28/21, officers responded to a homicide at 1916 Natchez Avenue. Victim observed on the ground outside of her vehicle suffering from at least one gunshot wound. Investigation ongoing. Name: Johnkelian “John John” Mathis

Age: 17

Location: Sherman Street at Minnesota Avenue

Details: On 08/08/2021, officers responded to a call of multiple gunshot wounds and multiple victims at Sherman Street at Minnesota Avenue. Two victims suffered gunshot wounds with a third suffering fatal injury. Investigation is ongoing at this time.

Name: Cholly Harris

Age: 19

Location: 1608 Hazen Street

Details: On 09/20/21, officers located victim laying in the yard at 1608 Hazen Street suffering from gunshot wounds. Name: Edgar Barrahona

Age: 25

Location: 203 W. Jackson Avenue

Details: On 10/02/21, officers responded to UT Medical Center in regards to victim who had been assaulted. Victim later died and the investigation is ongoing at this time. Name: Alonzo Rodgers

Age: 30

Location: 2800 Nichols Avenue

Details: On 11/24/21, officers responded to a homicide at 2800 Nichols Avenue. The victim was found inside suffering from an apparent gunshot wound. Investigation is ongoing. Name: Joseph "Little Joseph" Cory Hines

Age: 27

Location: 407 Juanita Cannon Street

Details: On 12/06/21, officers responded to an alley near Juanita Cannon Street and Selma Avenue. Upon arrival the body of victim was discovered. He was shot at least once. Investigation is ongoing. Name: Galven Jamor Siler

Age: 29

Location: 1425 E. Magnolia Avenue

Details: On 12/18/21, officers responded to parking lot at Wynonna Ave. at Magnolia Avenue in response to a shooting. Victim was laying on the ground with a gunshot wound to the back. Victim was transported to UT Medical Center where he remained for several days fighting for his life before succumbing to his wounds on Jan. 7, 2022. 2020 Name: Dessie Lewis Seaton, IV

Age: 26

Location: 3513 Sevier Avenue, Apt. L-29

Details: On 01/24/2020, Investigator responded to a murder at 3513 Sevier Avenue at an apartment complex in South Knoxville. Victim was found deceased from multiple gunshot wounds. Investigation is ongoing at this time. Name: Markedra Houston

Age: 32

Location: 2461 MLK Jr. Avenue

Details: On 04/04/2020, Investigator responded to a 2461 MLK Jr. Avenue where a victim was found in a car that had crashed into a building. Victim had multiple gunshot wounds to her legs. She was transported to UT Medical Center where she pronounced deceased.

Name: JaQuan Reese

Age: 19

Location: Sunset Avenue and S. Castle Street

Details: On 05/30/2020, Victim was taken to UT Medical Center with a gunshot wound. He was pronounced dead at the hospital. It is believed the shooting occurred in the area of Sunset Avenue and S. Castle Street. Investigation is ongoing. Name: Darryl Florence

Age: 30

Location: 1315 Kirby Road

Details: On 06/07/2020, Victim was found suffering from a gunshot wound while in his vehicle at a Knoxville hotel parking lot where six vehicles were damaged. Victim succumbed to his injuries. Investigation is ongoing. Name: Aseal Iysheh

Age: 24

Location: 2310 Magnolia Avenue

Details: On 06/11/2020, Victim was found deceased from gunshot wounds at 2310 Magnolia Avenue. Investigation is ongoing at this time. The family has a $20,000 reward for any information leading to Aseal’s homicide.

Name: Oran Alowlowo

Age: 39

Location: 2711 Fort Stanley Way

Details: On 09/17/2020, officers responded to find victim deceased on kitchen floor. Name: Derrick Lamont Perry, Jr.

Age: 18

Location: 3600 Block Lilac Avenue

Details: On 09/19/2020, officer responded to a murder at 3623 Lilac Avenue. Victim was found deceased on the back porch with an obvious gunshot wound. Name: Kenneth Anderson Jr.

Age: 19

Location: 1500 Block Dutch Valley Drive

Details: On 09/20/2020, officers responded to a shooting at a home in the 1500 block of Dutch Valley Drive. Victim was found inside with at least one gunshot wound. Investigation is ongoing. Name: DeMario Sheree Lowery

Age: 26

Location: 1942 Texas Avenue

Details: On 10/12/2020, a Chrysler 300 was discovered wrecked into a parked Ford Expedition. The driver was deceased from apparent gunshot wound. Investigation is ongoing. Name: Jeremiah Coleman

Age: 34

Location: 5423 Asheville Hwy.

Details: On 10/26/2020, detectives responded to a murder at 5423 Asheville Hwy. Upon arrival, victim’s body was discovered deceased on the bed in a hotel room. Investigation is ongoing at this time.
